!!!Attention Army!!! 

Our str3@ms on YouTube are getting very low. Pls go stream on YouTube and other platforms at least twice a day.

Here are the most important things to pay special attention to while str3@ming:

Turn off autoplay

Make sure the video quality is above 480p

Volume must be 50% or more

Don't skip/pause/double tap to move ten seconds forward + DON'T spam in the comments (no em0jis)

After you streamed one mv, don't str3@m the same mv AGAIN. Watch 2-3 other mv's in between to make your view count.

You can also str3@m with your earphones plugged in if it is too loud for you. 

Copy and spread!!!

Daily reminder to stream BST, FIRE, DOPE mv along with BUTTER & PTD daily..these mvs are close to become next 1B mvs. *FIRE and DOPE on 1theK!!!* Add these in your daily streaming list. Push BST more pls!!!

!!!Attention Army!!! 

Our str3@ms on YouTube are getting very low. We are called the biggest/ most powerful fandom and we can't even get 1 mio views for bts's latest music videos per day. Pls go stream on YouTube and other platforms at least twice a day.
Here's a simple str3@ming tutorial for you:

1. Search for bts mv manually from search bar
eg. type "bts butter" and select the mv from the results

2. Turn off autoplay

3. Make sure the video quality is above 480p

4. Volume must be 50% or more

5. Don't skip/pause/double tap to move ten seconds forward + DON'T spam in the comments (no em0jis)

6. Don't clear YouTube search history

7. After you streamed one mv, don't str3@m the same mv AGAIN. Watch 2-3 other mv's in between to make your view count.

You can also str3@m with your earphones plugged in if it is too loud for you. 💜
